pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sequential Trial Emulation // Implementation of sequential trial emulation for the analysis of observational databases. The 'SEQTaRget' software accommodates time-varying treatments and confounders, as well as binary and failure time outcomes. 'SEQTaRget' allows to compare both static and dynamic strategies, can be used to estimate observational analogs of intention-to-treat and per-protocol effects, and can adjust for potential selection bias induced by losses-to-follow-up. (Paper to come).
